channel.title: Cache

item.title: Cache
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Okay so whenever people download my client, they get the old cache, how do I make it so they download the new one?
this is my cachedownload file that I tried to change.

public class CacheDownloader {

private client client;

private final int BUFFER = 1024;

private final int VERSION = 1; // Version of cache
//private String cacheLink = "http://www.mediafire.com/?6ulrqhn0viw0uwb"; // Link to cache
private String cacheLink = "http://www.mediafire.com/?6ulrqhn0viw0uwb"; // Link to cache

private String fileToExtract = getCacheDir() + getArchivedName();

public CacheDownloader(client client) {
	this.client = client;
}

(BTW I leeched the serv so what do I gotta do?)

Read full topic
